attributes.action: stop targeting 4 X 4 Drivers and Road Haulage on carbon emmisions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Farming communities are already hit with more costs and a 4x4 is needed in rural areas , these vehicals are the first thing people need in a more increasing unprecedented weather change.Road haulage has  unfair competition with other european road users.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
